job.srcSql: select s.action, GROUP_CONCAT(s.p_id) ids, GROUP_CONCAT(s.action_sql) action_sql from (select * from sync_police_config where dest_table='record_carinout' LIMIT 20) s GROUP BY s.action
job.destTableFields: record_id, sys_id, pass_time, car_number, in_out, position, device_id, picture_url, owner_name, owner_tel, out_time, due_time, out_position, out_picture_url
job.destTableUpdate: sys_id, pass_time, car_number, in_out, position, device_id, picture_url, owner_name, owner_tel, out_time, due_time, out_position, out_picture_url
